name: I Rekomend Probing
description:
I Rekomend Probing is a fast-paced, arcade-style, alien abduction game, about taking revenge on the guy who called your mother a hoe, through peasant abduction, sacrifice and incineration.

It is a two player versus game where both players must abduct as many peasants as possible and recruit them into his or her armies in order to enact revenge.

Xbox controller support enabled.

Currently the game has one map and one UFO type but in (free) future updates the game will feature an array of maps and UFO types each with their own unique feel and abilities.
